description: In 2016, the Trans community under the leadership of Jayce Carver started the Windsor Essex Transgender and Allied Support and became their first Executive Director. It became federally incorporated in 2017, and in 2018 had its grand opening of its first independent space on 536 Pelissier on May 1st, 2018, then relocated to 111 Wyandotte Street West. That same year Jayce Carver won 40 Under 40 Outstanding Individuals in Windsor Essex. In 2021 it changed its name to Trans Wellness Ontario (TWO). And as of 2023 is housed at 1435 Tecumseh Road East.  Their mission “is to enhance and sustain the health and wellness of Transgender, GenderQueer, Two-Spirit, Non-Binary, Queer and Questioning communities and their families.”
